Company: Florida Cancer Specialists & Research Institute LLC
Description: Florida Cancer Specialists & Research Institute LLC, an oncology group headquartered in Fort Myers, Florida, agreed to pay $100 million under a deferred prosecution agreement that resolved allegations it conspired to allocate medical and radiation oncology treatments for cancer patients in Southwest Florida.
